result.formatted_address: D.D.2 Lot 648, Silvermine Bay, Mui Wo, Lantau Island, Hong Kong, Mui Wo Lantau Island, Hong Kong
result.name: Silvermine Beach Resort

reviews.text: I have been there twice and I still think it's a good place for a short stay or a break of weekend. There's never been crowded, full of holiday mood, summer atmosphere and romance. Especially I quite enjoyed the dinner and breakfast inside the resort restaurant there really got a feel that I was having a break on an outlaying island.
The view in front of the hotel was beautiful. The room was spacious, but quite stuffy. However, the breakfast was good; they got plenty of selections.
I love this place. Every visit to HK- I stay there,  clean, peaceful,  nice beach and barbecue zone

A lot of negative reviews did not scare me to try this place and I am glad I did. Staff are absolutely lovely! Rooms are very very retro indeed, which of course translates to dated, with some pretty grubby and worn out elements, but I found it just quirky overall. It’s clean. Shower pressure is fantastic. WiFi is free. Breakfast is plentiful ( custard buns stole my heart). And location is unbeatable in Mui Wo. Also, there are a good few places around called silvermine resort or similar, so I think some of the negative comments may actually be for a different property. Come with open mind :)
Old but very quiet and the wandering cattle and buffalo were amazing to see on the roads a d beach.

result.name: Silvermine Beach Resort Hotel

reviews.text: I love this place.  Close to HK by boat but it feels rural
Quite nice little hotel.
nice and clean resort, walking distance to the ferry
Not the best tasting food, considering the price. Walk down the street towards the ferry terminal and eat at the Cooked Seafood Market.
The hotel is fine, at affordable price with relaxing environment.

result.formatted_address: 香港大嶼山銀礦灣銀鑛灣渡假酒店
result.name: 灣畔軒

reviews.text:
今日下午時間黎到e到~知道e 到有大玻璃可以睇到沙灘既境所以就坐左window旁
就到聖誕 餐廳都換上裝飾同食物
但唔變既係佢地既lunch set

餐紙換上聖誕公仔 可以比小朋友去填顏色 唔錯!

睇睇lunch set 先
48蚊一set 唔收加一同埋包湯 酒店黎講就好平嫁啦
排骨蘿白湯: 好甜,係真老火湯 蘿白係入味既
我叫左個咖哩牛排飯
反轉睇 都有一大碗飯
嚴格黎講佢其實係甫汁 同埋牛排唔un 好味!仲比左幾粒薯仔同洋蔥 唔錯!
我鍾意這環境！食物好好味！
I love this place.  Close to HK by boat but it feels rural
優閒假期
Quite nice little hotel.

result.formatted_address: D.D.2 Lot 648, Silvermine Bay, Mui Wo, Lantau Island, Hong Kong, Mui Wo Lantau Island, 香港
result.name: 銀鑛灣渡假酒店

reviews.text: 一般般啦⋯⋯
環境👌

酒店很舊沒有電梯房間算大，床都舒服床上用品乾淨，但整體而言很舊，休閒渡假來這裡我沙灘游下水很方便的，至於酒店的兒童池我們已是差不多一開就入去，但覺得池水有點混濁，酒店有其他遊樂設施可供租用，有個小小小小的兒童遊戲室，酒店隔離有一個公園仔內有許多遊戲設施幾好玩。講到食呢到有我食過最差的自助餐，雖然平但都唔好比D咁既野人食，仲差過美心快餐蟹腳冇味似雪了好耐解凍後又雪番又解凍，青口乾淨淨的 螺ok既 蝦唔敢放入口因攞上手頭掉下來蝦身淋淋的，其他呢一般過一般，比較好的是燒烤但都唔好期望過高，整體而言係食得你飽，早餐又是美心快餐食得你飽，星期六日兩大一小包早晚餐都是千一蚊又唔可以要求咁多，整間酒店服務人員都有禮的，但在餐廳有個好惡好大聲的阿叔，不停咁鬧D職員。
